::: {style="text-align: center;"}
## Assignment Details <br>
:::

Create a 2 page field guide introducing the study organism poplar (one page per species). Using a graphite pencil sketch and label anatomical aspects of each tree (e.g. leaf, bud, connections, branch). The final product should be accurate enough to be used for identification in the field.

::: {style="margin-top: 3em;"}
:::
